description.value: Primary Energy: Fire 2 (creating illumination, minor effect) Supporting Energy: Time 3 (duration 10 minutes) Range: Touch Duration: 10 minutes Total Cost: 5 Energy Action: Simple weave (1 action) Weaving Roll: Fire Potential + Fire Mastery / Time Potential + Time Mastery Effect: Object you touch sheds bright light in 20ft radius and dim light for another 20 feet. Can be cast on a hostile creature ([[/save type=reflex]] to avoid). Saving Throw: Reflex (if targeting hostile creature to avoid) Success Scaling: 0 = fails, 1 = 1 minute, 2 = full effect, 3 = 1 hour, 4 = 8 hours or daylight brightness
